div.blockquote: When the person is still there is no shame and are afraid to do something good, it is a guarantee for that person is a not meet with a single step of progress
None of us are really dumb and none of us are really smart. We're in the middle.
Who are you to judge the life I live? I know I'm not perfect -and I don't live to be- but before you start pointing fingers... make sure you hands are clean!
People are afraid of themselves, of their own reality; their feelings most of all. People talk about how great love is, but that’s bullshit.
